cast.name: 埃里克·罗伯茨 Eric Roberts
安东尼·雷·帕克 Anthony Ray Parker
宝拉·马尔切纳罗·索林杰 Paula Marcenaro Solinger

director.name: 罗伯特·皮特斯 Robert Peters

introduction: Stuart Sagle is leading in the race for Governor of Texas, but a fling with a prostitute threatens to derail his campaign. His biggest supporter, his uncle Bill Sagle, has a plan that puts a second candidate, Tim Bayh, into play, and Tim finds himself as the first Black candidate for Governor in Texas' history. Thrust into circumstances he neither understands nor controls, Tim weaves his way past assassination attempts, and faces his own demons as he has to decide to quit the race, ride a wave to the statehouse, or die trying.
